price: 60. à l’exception de sa femme. » « Nous (Allah) l’avons destinée à être du nombre des disparus. »
arabic: إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَآ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: illā im'ra-atahu qaddarnā innahā lamina al-ghābirīna
